title: Embattled CDC Rethinks Pandemic Response After Criticism of Guidelines
sub_head: Critics press agency to make changes after botching some Covd-19 measures and issuing confusing recommendations
body:
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is looking to reassert itself in the countryâ€™s Covid-19 response amid criticism it has sown more confusion than it has offered answers.
Among the first orders of business, according to the agency, is upgrading data collection that has hobbled decision making and clearing up messaging that has confused many.
